section.name: Overview
section.p: Commons provides a set of libraries, services and APIs meant to be the most basic, general-purpose horizontal module for all ACM-SL projects.

subsection.name: Status
subsection.p:
Commons 0.5.5b5 contains:
regexpplugin: API to request regexp services independently of the concrete engine used.
patterns: Interfaces and some implementations of desing patterns.
versionable: API to export and manage per-file CVS information.
utils: General-purpose helper classes.
automata: API to model stateful behaviours.
